001package com.technototes.path.trajectorysequence;
002
003import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
004import com.acmerobotics.dashboard.FtcDashboard;
005import com.acmerobotics.dashboard.canvas.Canvas;
006import com.acmerobotics.dashboard.config.Config;
007import com.acmerobotics.dashboard.telemetry.TelemetryPacket;
008import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.control.PIDCoefficients;
009import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.control.PIDFController;
010import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.drive.DriveSignal;
011import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.followers.TrajectoryFollower;
012import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.geometry.Pose2d;
013import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.profile.MotionState;
014import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.trajectory.Trajectory;
015import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.trajectory.TrajectoryMarker;
016import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.util.NanoClock;
017import com.technototes.path.trajectorysequence.sequencesegment.SequenceSegment;
018import com.technototes.path.trajectorysequence.sequencesegment.TrajectorySegment;
019import com.technototes.path.trajectorysequence.sequencesegment.TurnSegment;
020import com.technototes.path.trajectorysequence.sequencesegment.WaitSegment;
021import com.technototes.path.util.DashboardUtil;
022import java.util.ArrayList;
023import java.util.Collections;
024import java.util.LinkedList;
025import java.util.List;
026
027@Config
028public class TrajectorySequenceRunner {
029
030    public static boolean DO_DASH = false;
031
032    public static String COLOR_INACTIVE_TRAJECTORY = "#4caf507a";
033    public static String COLOR_INACTIVE_TURN = "#7c4dff7a";
034    public static String COLOR_INACTIVE_WAIT = "#dd2c007a";
035
036    public static String COLOR_ACTIVE_TRAJECTORY = "#4CAF50";
037    public static String COLOR_ACTIVE_TURN = "#7c4dff";
038    public static String COLOR_ACTIVE_WAIT = "#dd2c00";
039
040    public static int POSE_HISTORY_LIMIT = 100;
041
042    private final TrajectoryFollower follower;
043
044    private final PIDFController turnController;
045
046    private final NanoClock clock;
047
048    private TrajectorySequence currentTrajectorySequence;
049    private double currentSegmentStartTime;
050    private int currentSegmentIndex;
051    private int lastSegmentIndex;
052
053    private Pose2d lastPoseError = new Pose2d();
054
055    List<TrajectoryMarker> remainingMarkers = new ArrayList<>();
056
057    private FtcDashboard dashboard;
058    private final LinkedList<Pose2d> poseHistory = new LinkedList<>();
059
060    public TrajectorySequenceRunner(
061        TrajectoryFollower follower,
062        PIDCoefficients headingPIDCoefficients
063    ) {
064        this.follower = follower;
065
066        turnController = new PIDFController(headingPIDCoefficients);
067        turnController.setInputBounds(0, 2 * Math.PI);
068
069        clock = NanoClock.system();
070
071        if (DO_DASH) dashboard = FtcDashboard.getInstance();
072        if (dashboard != null) dashboard.setTelemetryTransmissionInterval(25);
073    }
074
075    public void followTrajectorySequenceAsync(TrajectorySequence trajectorySequence) {
076        currentTrajectorySequence = trajectorySequence;
077        currentSegmentStartTime = clock.seconds();
078        currentSegmentIndex = 0;
079        lastSegmentIndex = -1;
080    }
081
082    public @Nullable DriveSignal update(Pose2d poseEstimate, Pose2d poseVelocity) {
083        Pose2d targetPose = null;
084        DriveSignal driveSignal = null;
085
086        SequenceSegment currentSegment = null;
087
088        if (currentTrajectorySequence != null) {
089            if (currentSegmentIndex >= currentTrajectorySequence.size()) {
090                for (TrajectoryMarker marker : remainingMarkers) {
091                    marker.getCallback().onMarkerReached();
092                }
093
094                remainingMarkers.clear();
095
096                currentTrajectorySequence = null;
097            }
098
099            if (currentTrajectorySequence == null) return new DriveSignal();
100
101            double now = clock.seconds();
102            boolean isNewTransition = currentSegmentIndex != lastSegmentIndex;
103
104            currentSegment = currentTrajectorySequence.get(currentSegmentIndex);
105
106            if (isNewTransition) {
107                currentSegmentStartTime = now;
108                lastSegmentIndex = currentSegmentIndex;
109
110                for (TrajectoryMarker marker : remainingMarkers) {
111                    marker.getCallback().onMarkerReached();
112                }
113
114                remainingMarkers.clear();
115
116                remainingMarkers.addAll(currentSegment.getMarkers());
117                Collections.sort(
118                    remainingMarkers,
119                    (t1, t2) -> Double.compare(t1.getTime(), t2.getTime())
120                );
121            }
122
123            double deltaTime = now - currentSegmentStartTime;
124
125            if (currentSegment instanceof TrajectorySegment) {
126                Trajectory currentTrajectory = ((TrajectorySegment) currentSegment).getTrajectory();
127
128                if (isNewTransition) follower.followTrajectory(currentTrajectory);
129
130                if (!follower.isFollowing()) {
131                    currentSegmentIndex++;
132
133                    driveSignal = new DriveSignal();
134                } else {
135                    driveSignal = follower.update(poseEstimate, poseVelocity);
136                    lastPoseError = follower.getLastError();
137                }
138
139                targetPose = currentTrajectory.get(deltaTime);
140            } else if (currentSegment instanceof TurnSegment) {
141                MotionState targetState =
142                    ((TurnSegment) currentSegment).getMotionProfile().get(deltaTime);
143
144                turnController.setTargetPosition(targetState.getX());
145
146                double correction = turnController.update(poseEstimate.getHeading());
147
148                double targetOmega = targetState.getV();
149                double targetAlpha = targetState.getA();
150
151                lastPoseError = new Pose2d(0, 0, turnController.getLastError());
152
153                Pose2d startPose = currentSegment.getStartPose();
154                targetPose = startPose.copy(startPose.getX(), startPose.getY(), targetState.getX());
155
156                driveSignal =
157                    new DriveSignal(
158                        new Pose2d(0, 0, targetOmega + correction),
159                        new Pose2d(0, 0, targetAlpha)
160                    );
161
162                if (deltaTime >= currentSegment.getDuration()) {
163                    currentSegmentIndex++;
164                    driveSignal = new DriveSignal();
165                }
166            } else if (currentSegment instanceof WaitSegment) {
167                lastPoseError = new Pose2d();
168
169                targetPose = currentSegment.getStartPose();
170                driveSignal = new DriveSignal();
171
172                if (deltaTime >= currentSegment.getDuration()) {
173                    currentSegmentIndex++;
174                }
175            }
176
177            while (remainingMarkers.size() > 0 && deltaTime > remainingMarkers.get(0).getTime()) {
178                remainingMarkers.get(0).getCallback().onMarkerReached();
179                remainingMarkers.remove(0);
180            }
181        }
182
183        poseHistory.add(poseEstimate);
184
185        if (POSE_HISTORY_LIMIT > -1 && poseHistory.size() > POSE_HISTORY_LIMIT) {
186            poseHistory.removeFirst();
187        }
188
189        if (DO_DASH) {
190            TelemetryPacket packet = new TelemetryPacket();
191            Canvas fieldOverlay = packet.fieldOverlay();
192
193            packet.put("x", poseEstimate.getX());
194            packet.put("y", poseEstimate.getY());
195            packet.put("heading (deg)", Math.toDegrees(poseEstimate.getHeading()));
196
197            packet.put("xError", getLastPoseError().getX());
198            packet.put("yError", getLastPoseError().getY());
199            packet.put("headingError (deg)", Math.toDegrees(getLastPoseError().getHeading()));
200
201            if (dashboard != null) draw(
202                fieldOverlay,
203                currentTrajectorySequence,
204                currentSegment,
205                targetPose,
206                poseEstimate
207            );
208
209            if (dashboard != null) dashboard.sendTelemetryPacket(packet);
210        }
211
212        return driveSignal;
213    }
214
215    private void draw(
216        Canvas fieldOverlay,
217        TrajectorySequence sequence,
218        SequenceSegment currentSegment,
219        Pose2d targetPose,
220        Pose2d poseEstimate
221    ) {
222        if (sequence != null) {
223            for (int i = 0; i < sequence.size(); i++) {
224                SequenceSegment segment = sequence.get(i);
225
226                if (segment instanceof TrajectorySegment) {
227                    fieldOverlay.setStrokeWidth(1);
228                    fieldOverlay.setStroke(COLOR_INACTIVE_TRAJECTORY);
229
230                    DashboardUtil.drawSampledPath(
231                        fieldOverlay,
232                        ((TrajectorySegment) segment).getTrajectory().getPath()
233                    );
234                } else if (segment instanceof TurnSegment) {
235                    Pose2d pose = segment.getStartPose();
236
237                    fieldOverlay.setFill(COLOR_INACTIVE_TURN);
238                    fieldOverlay.fillCircle(pose.getX(), pose.getY(), 2);
239                } else if (segment instanceof WaitSegment) {
240                    Pose2d pose = segment.getStartPose();
241
242                    fieldOverlay.setStrokeWidth(1);
243                    fieldOverlay.setStroke(COLOR_INACTIVE_WAIT);
244                    fieldOverlay.strokeCircle(pose.getX(), pose.getY(), 3);
245                }
246            }
247        }
248
249        if (currentSegment != null) {
250            if (currentSegment instanceof TrajectorySegment) {
251                Trajectory currentTrajectory = ((TrajectorySegment) currentSegment).getTrajectory();
252
253                fieldOverlay.setStrokeWidth(1);
254                fieldOverlay.setStroke(COLOR_ACTIVE_TRAJECTORY);
255
256                DashboardUtil.drawSampledPath(fieldOverlay, currentTrajectory.getPath());
257            } else if (currentSegment instanceof TurnSegment) {
258                Pose2d pose = currentSegment.getStartPose();
259
260                fieldOverlay.setFill(COLOR_ACTIVE_TURN);
261                fieldOverlay.fillCircle(pose.getX(), pose.getY(), 3);
262            } else if (currentSegment instanceof WaitSegment) {
263                Pose2d pose = currentSegment.getStartPose();
264
265                fieldOverlay.setStrokeWidth(1);
266                fieldOverlay.setStroke(COLOR_ACTIVE_WAIT);
267                fieldOverlay.strokeCircle(pose.getX(), pose.getY(), 3);
268            }
269        }
270
271        if (targetPose != null) {
272            fieldOverlay.setStrokeWidth(1);
273            fieldOverlay.setStroke("#4CAF50");
274            DashboardUtil.drawRobot(fieldOverlay, targetPose);
275        }
276
277        fieldOverlay.setStroke("#3F51B5");
278        DashboardUtil.drawPoseHistory(fieldOverlay, poseHistory);
279
280        fieldOverlay.setStroke("#3F51B5");
281        DashboardUtil.drawRobot(fieldOverlay, poseEstimate);
282    }
283
284    public Pose2d getLastPoseError() {
285        return lastPoseError;
286    }
287
288    public boolean isBusy() {
289        return currentTrajectorySequence != null;
290    }
291}
